about_the_game:
The Starter Pack is a deluxe item pack containing invaluable items to help you on your adventures in CosmicBreak Universal! It includes not only exclusive parts and characters like Astro Meria and Zero Saber -Steam-, but Garapon tickets and more!

Starter Pack Exclusive Robots
  • Astro Meria
  • Zero Saber -Steam-
  • Saggitary Maxis -Steam-

Starter Pack Exclusive Parts
  • Steam Flag BSJ x1
  • Vesper Gear ALPHA x1
  • Vesper Wing ALPHA x1
  • Vesper Shield ALPHA x1

Starter Pack Miscellaneous Items
  • 150 Rt
  • Robo Garapon Ticket x5
  • SP Garapon Ticket x10
  • Cosmo Harmonics 20% x50
  • Tune Up Set 10 x5
  • ALL×3 Ticket 1h x3

*The Starter Pack is a one-time only purchase for each account.
*Robo Garapon Tickets and SP Garapon Tickets can be used to roll the Garapon, which can be accessed from in the in-game Shop.

content_descriptors.notes: note: Includes violent expressions and highly exposed clothing.

name: CosmicBreak Universal Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce4 / ATI RADEON 8500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Core2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 2900
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)

short_description: The Starter Pack is a deluxe item pack containing invaluable items to help you on your adventures in CosmicBreak Universal! It includes not only exclusive parts and characters like Astro Meria and Zero Saber -Steam-, but Garapon tickets and more!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
